name: Defiant Doll (Trijam #206)
description:
Made for Trijam #206 in a little under 4 hours. The theme was "Just another copy". In this game's lore the wind-up maids are mass manufactured copies, but there was once an original, a flesh and blood human girl. Nothing resembling lore made it into the actual jam game.

Controls

Up arrow to jump. No other controls.

Walls and other wind-up dolls slow you down. The goal is to get as far as you can before you run out of energy.

If you run out of energy or you fall to your death, you have to reload the game. There is no respawn function. Sorry ):

Credits

Spooky Castle Tileset by Buch - https://opengameart.org/users/buch

https://opengameart.org/content/spooky-castle-tileset
